column4: Hi guys, i need help with installation..please because i am trying o install it more than 6 hours
well i am using unetbootin and i create a USB boot for Ubuntu, i am doing the installatin normally, i remove the usb but the ubuntu never starts...
it stops at load screen of Booting my compute at verifying dmi pool data
any idea why Ubuntu doesn't load/boot after the installation ? all steps seem to be done correctly
yes if i load it from UsB it loads fine, with internet available
i have intel core 2 quad (i was running windows 7 64bit up to now)
what does it do exatly? you see a grub menu?
you can get by with just a / and swap.
seems odd you are not even getting to the grub menu.
it would be hidden by default unless you hit the shift key. but you are not even seeing the splash screens. so somthing else seems wrong
double check your bios and makre sure its set to boot from the hd?
